import React from 'react' import { ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import CartItem from './CartItem' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../../../styles/shopping-cart.css' import '../../../styles/index.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { cartUiActions } from '../../../store/shopping/cartUiSlice' const Carts = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartProducts = useSelector(state = state.cart.CartItems) const toggleCart = () => { dispatch(cartUiActions.toggle()) } return (
Subtotal : $123
) } export default Carts
